author: perezhilton
title: Ed Sheeran Surprising 8-Year-Old Viral Singer Kai Langer Mid-Serenade WILL Make Your Heart Burst!
text:
Has there ever been anything cuter??
For Tuesday's show, eight-year-old viral singer Kai Langer returned to Ellen DeGeneres ' stage to present her with a Valentine's Day card, announce her as his girlfriend, and serenade her with Ed Sheeran 's Thinking Out Loud !
We're so jealous!!
Related: Khloé Kardashian Self-Inflicts Shade Talking To Ellen! 
And during his passionate performance, the adorable Internet sensation was actually surprised with an appearance from the British native!
It's too bad they couldn't do a duet! Watch the cuteness unfold (above)! 
Tags: ed sheeran , ellen degeneres , kai langer , music minute , the ellen show , thinking out loud , tv news , viral: kids
